mapper.sql: a.invocie_nbr AS "invocieNbr", a.invocie_brank AS "invocieBrank", a.pic_one_url AS "picOneUrl", a.pic_two_url AS "picTwoUrl"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fx_invocie_nbr( invocie_nbr, invocie_brank, pic_one_url, pic_two_url ) VALUES ( #{invocieNbr}, #{invocieBrank}, #{picOneUrl}, #{picTwoUrl} )
